Sentencas: Strontium doped NdCrO3 solid solutions (0.05 <= x <= 0.25) were synthesized using a solid-state reaction.
Titulo: Structures and properties of Sr-doped NdCrO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: The effects of Sr doping on the structures, electrical and thermal expansion properties of the solid solutions were studied.
Titulo: Structures and properties of Sr-doped NdCrO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: The results show that all the solid solutions prepared possess a single phase orthorhombic perovskite structure at room temperature.
Titulo: Structures and properties of Sr-doped NdCrO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: With the increase of Sr content in Nd site, the cell volume of Nd1-xSrxCrO3 solid solutions decreases gradually.
Titulo: Structures and properties of Sr-doped NdCrO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: The sinterability of the solid solutions is remarkably improved compared with pure NdCrO3.
Titulo: Structures and properties of Sr-doped NdCrO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: The relative densities of the samples are all higher than 96%, among which Nd0.75Sr0.25CrO3 sample presents the highest value of 97.8%.
Titulo: Structures and properties of Sr-doped NdCrO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: Both the electrical conductivity and the thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) of Nd1-xSrxCrO3 increase with the increase of Sr content.
Titulo: Structures and properties of Sr-doped NdCrO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: Sample Nd0.75Sr0.25CrO3 exhibits the highest electrical conductivity of 1.73 x 10(3)
Titulo: Structures and properties of Sr-doped NdCrO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: S m(-1) at 850 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Structures and properties of Sr-doped NdCrO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: And it also attains the highest TEC of 9.45 x 10(-6) K-1 over temperature range from 30 to 1000 degrees C, which is basically compatible with that of yttria stabilized zirconia (10.3 x 10(-6) K-1).
Titulo: Structures and properties of Sr-doped NdCrO3 solid solutions

Sentencas: Nd0.75Sr0.25CrO3 may be considered as a promising interconnect material for solid oxide fuel cells according to the electrical and thermal expansion behaviors.
Titulo: Structures and properties of Sr-doped NdCrO3 solid solutions
